name: 8Pay Payment Gateway
author: 8Pay

sections.description:
Accept 8PAY, BNB, BUSD, USDT, USDC, and more directly on your store with the 8Pay payment gateway for WooCommerce.

Take crypto payments easily and directly on your store

The 8Pay plugin extends WooCommerce allowing you to take payments directly on your store via 8Pay’s API.

Supported tokens on BNB Chain

  • 8PAY
  • BNB
  • WBNB
  • BUSD
  • USDT
  • USDC
  • ETH
  • BTCB
  • MATIC
  • CAKE
  • BSCPAD
  • DAI
  • CUMMIES
  • NAFTY
  • HAPPY
  • DOGE

Supported tokens on Ethereum

  • 8PAY
  • ETH
  • WETH
  • BNB
  • BUSD
  • USDT
  • USDC
  • WBTC
  • DAI
  • MATIC

Supported tokens on Polygon

  • 8PAY
  • MATIC
  • WMATIC
  • USDT
  • USDC
  • BNB
  • WETH
  • WBTC
  • DAI

Why choose 8Pay?

8Pay has no setup fees, no monthly fees, no hidden costs! Earnings are transferred to your wallet immediately.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of the WooCommerce 8Pay plugin, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click “Add New”.

In the search field type “8Pay Payment Gateway” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly, of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”, then “Activate”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
Does this support both production mode and sandbox mode for testing?

Yes, both production and sandbox mode are supported.

Where can I find documentation?

For help setting up and configuring, please refer to our documentation.
